name: Braya
introduction: Hello! I'm Braya, a junior software developer with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies. I am passionate about creating user-centric, scalable, and efficient web applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. With a diverse tech stack and a drive for continuous learning, I am dedicated to crafting solutions that meet the demands of modern web development.

responsibilities: Developing and maintaining web applications using Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and other frontend technologies.
Building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js to support dynamic web content and functionality.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver projects that align with business goals.
Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility for web applications.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform that supports product listing, user authentication, and payment processing. Utilized Vue.js for the frontend, Node.js and Express.js for the backend, and integrated with MySQL for data storage.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Created a personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills. Built with Nuxt.js and Tailwind CSS, emphasizing a clean, responsive design.

description: I enjoy the challenge of solving complex problems and thrive in environments where I can work on projects that make a difference. My technical skills in both frontend and backend development allow me to take on a variety of roles within a project, from creating intuitive user interfaces to building scalable APIs. I am highly motivated, detail-oriented, and continuously expanding my skill set to keep up with the latest technologies.
goals: My current goal is to enhance my proficiency in backend frameworks and databases, as well as to gain more experience with cloud-based solutions. I am also interested in contributing to open-source projects to further develop my coding skills and collaborate with the developer community.
